Description: [Key:LLSUMMONINF_Description:Max summons are set to 3 by default, with the option to increase it further. Also contains helper skills for preparing your summons faster outside of combat. Activate Summoning Tweaks - Permanent Summons for permanent summon durations.]

Entries.Text: See the full changelog in the 'Change Notes' tab on the Steam Workshop page.

Changes: Updated Extender API usage to v59.
Fixed a script error with setting MaxSummons post-v56.
